"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-f330-41c6-2c2c-0a9f7f6858c9#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A sumer reneszánsz korának művészete</string>
            <string language="en">the art of time of sumer renaissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die kunst der Zeit der sumer Renaissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de la période de la Renaissance de sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a arte da época do renascimento do sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte di periodo della rinascita del sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η τέχνη του χρόνου της αναγέννησης sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el arte de la época del renacimiento del sumer</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A sumer reneszánsz korának művészete. A korszak általános jellemzőinek és legfontosabb alkotásainak bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">The art of sumer renaissance era. Presentation of the average characteristics and works of the era.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">új-sumer,  sumer reneszánsz,  Gudea,  Ur-Nammu,  dombormű,  </string>
            <string language="en">new-sumer, sumer renaissance, Gudea, Úr-Nammu, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die kunst der sumer Renaissanceära. 
Darstellung der durchschnittlichen Eigenschaften und der 
Arbeiten der Ära.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'art de l'ère de la Renaissance de sumer. 
Présentation des caractéristiques et des travaux moyens de 
l'ère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arte da era do renascimento do sumer. 
Apresentação das características e dos trabalhos médios da 
era.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte dell'era di rinascita del sumer. 
Presentazione delle caratteristiche e degli impianti medii 
dell'era.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τέχνη της εποχής αναγέννησης sumer. 
Παρουσίαση των μέσων χαρακτηριστικών και των εργασιών της 
εποχής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El arte de la era del renacimiento del sumer. 
Presentación de las características y de los trabajos medios 
de la era.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">neu-sumer, sumer Renaissance, Gudea, Úr-Nammu, Prägung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nouveau-sumer, la Renaissance de sumer, Gudea, Úr-Nammu, 
foulage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">novo-sumer, renascimento do sumer, Gudea, Úr-Nammu, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nuovo-sumer, rinascita del sumer, Gudea, Úr-Nammu, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νέος -νέος-σuμερ, sumer αναγέννηση, Gudea, 3uρ- 
Nammu, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nuevo-sumer, renacimiento del sumer, Gudea, Úr-Nammu, repujado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
